Event.name: Employment_continue
Event.definition: <def-root>This is a non-perspectivized frame representing the middle stage of the Employment_scenario, in which there is a stable employment relationship between the <fen>Employee</fen> and the <fen>Employer</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Employee
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who is obligated to perform some <fen>Task</fen> in order to receive <fen>Compensation</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Employer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person (or institution) that gives <fen>Compensation</fen> to an <fen>Employee</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Compensation
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Compensation</fen> is the payment that the <fen>Employee</fen> receives for performing a <fen>Task</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the amount of time for which the <fen>Employee</fen> continues the employment.</def-root>

Arg.name: Field
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Field</fen> in which one works.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which the relationship between an <fen>Employer</fen> and an <fen>Employee</fen> develops.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place where the <fen>Employee</fen> works for the <fen>Employer</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Position
Arg.definition: <def-root>The label given to a particular type of employment.</def-root>

Arg.name: Task
Arg.definition: <def-root>Task identifies the action that the <fen>Employee</fen> is obligated to do for the <fen>Employer</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when an <fen>Employer</fen> employs the <fen>Employee</fen>.</def-root>
